alert.note: Alert for Bent (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 06 at 9:55PM MDT until July 06 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL PROWERS AND NORTHEASTERN BENT COUNTIES... At 954 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Wiley, or near Lamar, moving southeast at 10 mph. A second circulation capable of producing a tornado near Wiley. HAZARD...Tornado and baseball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Lamar and Wiley. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
